sqlMap.select: SELECT A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NM FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID WHERE (YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID) IN (SELECT YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE (METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR) IN (SELECT METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND METRIC_ID = #findMetricId#) AND DELETE_DT IS NULL) AND OULEVEL < 2
SELECT DEPT_ID FROM ( SELECT DEPT_ID FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND SC_DEPT_ID = #findScDeptCd# ORDER BY DEPT_ID ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

select.isEqual: SELECT YEAR ,MON ,DEPT_ID AS DEPT_CD ,DEPT_NM ,ROLE_TC_NM ,INSP_KIND_TC_NM ,LAW_TC_NM ,STIC_LAG_TC_NM ,STIC_MID_TC_NM ,STIC_SML_TC_NM ,INSP_QTY ,RE_INSP_QTY ,NVL(LENG, '0') AS LENG ,TOTAL ,RLTV_VAL ,TOTAL_RLTV_VAL FROM V_GHF0221D_005 WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND MON = #findMon# AND DEPT_ID = #findDeptId#

SELECT ROWNUM AS TOTAL_INDEX , YEAR , MON , DEPT_ID , DEPT_NM , EMPN , KOR_NM , CAST_TC , CAST_TC_NM , POS_TC , POS_TC_NM , TOTAL_CNT FROM (SELECT A.YEAR , A.MON , A.DEPT_ID , (SELECT AA.DEPT_NM FROM BSC_DEPTINFO AA WHERE AA.DEPT_ID = A.DEPT_ID) AS DEPT_NM , A.EMPN , A.KOR_NM , A.CAST_TC , A.CAST_TC_NM , A.POS_TC , A.POS_TC_NM , COUNT(DEPT_ID) OVER (PARTITION BY DEPT_ID) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BSC_I_USER_DETAIL A WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.MON = #findMon# AND A.DEPT_ID = #findDeptId# ORDER BY A.CAST_TC, A.KOR_NM )

sqlMap.select: SELECT A.ITEM_CD, B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM FROM BSC_SYSTEM_ITEM A , BSC_CAL_TYPE_COL B WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND B.METRIC_ID = #findMetricId# AND B.INSERT_GUBUN = '01' ORDER BY B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM
